2054.subject: THAI
2054.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the fourth semester of Thai. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in THAI 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in THAI 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in THAI 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in THAI 201 or 202.
